code: import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router';import{useEffect}from'react';import{URL}from'../../config';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import axios from'axios';var DeleteChapter=function DeleteChapter(){var navigate=useNavigate();var _useLocation=useLocation(),state=_useLocation.state;var deleteChapterById=function deleteChapterById(){var courseChapterid=state.courseChapterid;var url="".concat(URL,"/chapter/delete/").concat(courseChapterid);axios.delete(url).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result['status']=='success'){toast.success("chapter deleted Successfully");navigate('/admin');}else{toast.error("Chapter not deleted");}});};useEffect(function(){deleteChapterById();},[]);};export default DeleteChapter;
